name: hmmer
publications: Eddy, S. R. (1998). Profile hidden Markov models. Bioinformatics, 14:755-763.
Eddy, S. R. (2008). A probabilistic model of local sequence alignment that simplifies statistical significance estimation. PLoS Comput. Biol.,
description: An implementation of profile HMM methods for sensitive database searches using multiple sequence alignments as queries
